channel.title: general on Vinesh Raju
channel.description: Recent content in general on Vinesh Raju

item.title: In the beginning
item.description: I’ve always wanted to set up a website, a blog, and write. Not that I had something to say online, I just wanted to blabber and share bits and pieces from time to time. I’ve tried out a few blogging platforms before but never stuck with them. They were too formal. I wanted a place where I can be informal. Just write and publish. I liked HEY World, but it came only with their email service which was too expensive for me.
